subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Penske Racing hired Will Power, a 28-year-old Australian, to drive full time next year in the Indy Racing League after he had a part-time role last season.
snippet: Penske Racing hired Will Power, a 28-year-old Australian, to drive full time next year in the Indy Racing League after he had a part-time role last season.
